title: Iskra Lawrence flaunts her bountiful booty in London
title_page: Iskra Lawrence flaunts her bountiful booty in London | Daily Mail Online
text:
She is renowned for promoting healthy female body image at any size.
And model Iskra Lawrence, 26, flaunted her ample derriere and slim waist in a dazzling pair of gold trousers as she headed out for dinner in London on Wednesday.
The beauty, who is a size 14, threw her blonde tresses over her shoulders and shot a sultry gaze at the lens as she showed off her ample assets.
Scroll down for video
Bootay: Iskra Lawrence, 26, flaunted her bountiful booty and slim waist in a dazzling pair of gold trousers as she headed out for dinner in London on Wednesday
The British beauty was out for the evening at busy eatery Cafe Pacifico in Convent Garden.
Iskra accessorised her figure-hugging ensemble with high heeled tan suede boots, which lifted her derriere even higher.
The model matched her boots with her simple tan coloured top and small designer clutch bag.
The fitness and body positivity advocate looked happy and relaxed in her outfit and, true to form, carried a bag of popcorn in one hand as she flaunted her curves.
Suited and booted: Iskra accessorised her figure-hugging ensemble with high heeled tan suede boots, which lifted her derriere even higher
Positive: The fitness and body positivity advocate looked happy and relaxed in her outfit and, true to form, carried a bag of popcorn in one hand as she flaunted her curves
Fashionista :The model matched her boots with her simple tan top and small designer clutch bag
Gorgeous: The beauty, who is a size 14, threw her blonde tresses over her shoulders and shot a sultry gaze at the lens as she showed off her ample assets
Two weeks ago, Iskra launched a staunch defence of her body image in a passionate Instagram rant.
The star is no stranger to sharing a racy underwear selfie or two.
Sharing three pictures of herself in a stylish white swimsuit, the beauty showed how angles can drastically change appearance.
'No retouching': Two weeks ago, Iskra launched a staunch defence of her body image in a passionate Instagram rant
She began her post by writing: 'I've been reading a few of your comments saying I've lost weight & need to stop working out erm no.
'First off our bodies are allowed to fluctuate its natural, and also no one else has the right to tell you what to do with your body. That's why it's called yours.
'I try to look after my body as best as I can because it's my home I love & respect it and it's the only one I got for hopefully a long time so I invest in caring for it.'
Truthful: Sharing three pictures of herself in a stylish white swimsuit, the beauty showed how angles can drastically change appearance
